name: 4.23 "Relief Bartender" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Woody say came with his car?
questions.explanation:
toaster.

	Norm tells him that his friend is a mechanic and only fixes things that come with the car. Woody replies his toaster did come with the car it was a special.

questions.text: Why is Diane upset with Sam?
questions.correct: He went out with another woman.
options: He didn't give her a raise.
He didn't ask her out on a date.
He made fun of the opera.
questions.explanation:
He went out with another woman.

	Diane figured since they were kissing last week (the last episode before this episode) that Sam wouldn't see other women. However, Sam figured since he and Diane weren't actually dating, nor did they go back to his place, he could date whoever he wanted to date.

questions.text: What did Sam decide to do?
questions.correct: step outside the bar to become manager/host
questions.explanation:
step outside the bar to become manager/host.

	Sam thought it would be good for business if he became the manager/host of the bar. He heard about other places doing that and wanted to give it a try.

questions.text: Do the others support his decision?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Sam asked the others what they think and they thought it was a bad idea. However, Sam decided he was going to do it anyway.

questions.text: How many people showed up from the lodge?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Sam was expecting a lot of people since it was a lodge that was coming but it turned out to be only three. The man explained to Sam that their division of the lodge was just starting out.

Diane's body.

	Cliff suggested the waitresses wear skimpy outfits. Sam thought it was a good idea but then Carla said she didn't want someone to look at something she's ashamed of. He told Carla "you have a lovely body" to which Carla replied that she was talking about Diane's body.

questions.text: When Sam told Diane, "You don't have my brain" what did Diane reply?
questions.explanation:
"Whoever has it should return it."

	Sam got upset with her. She then said, "You need it right now."

No.

	Sam was going to fire Ken. However, when he met Ken's wife and children he couldn't bring himself to fire Ken so he gave him a raise instead.

questions.text: What did Ken's son say about Diane?
options: "How do you put up with her?"
questions.explanation:
"I don't like her."

	Sam told him to try dating her. Sam then has the kids go sit on Woody's lap while he talks to Woody about his problem of not being able to fire Ken.

No.

	Woody was going to leave but Ken ended up getting another job so he left. Woody at first didn't want to stay since Sam wanted to let him go before, but in the end he ended up staying.
